name: Natural Selection Simulator
description:
Create your creature and let it live in the wild together with the other animal kind. Your goal is to help your creature dominate the nature by giving it proper features that will give it an edge over its opponent. 

This is a project in development. I have been developing it for a month and I am having fun doing it. I hope you will have fun too.

Controls

  • WASD for camera movement
  • Q and E for camera rotation
  • Mouse scroll for camera zoom

Hint: Try to keep your energy cost as low as possible. Strength is for carnivores(meat eaters) to beat other animals. If you have a herbivore keep strength as one.

This is a game I made for fun during my spare time. I plan to release one game from different genres every month. Please follow me if you'd like to see more and better projects in the future.

Enjoy!
